messages.subject: The Last Samurai Site
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone interested, here is a link to the new movie The Last Samurai flash website, with links to the teaser trailer, full trailer, winamp and windows
messages.messageBody:
For anyone interested, here is a link to the new movie "The Last
Samurai" flash website, with links to the teaser trailer, full
trailer, winamp and windows media player skins, info on the cast and
crew, etc:

http://www.buzztone.com/lastsamurai/bclick.asp?sel=b2&ori=35
